CustomField.formula: IF( VALUE(RIGHT(TEXT(Dining_Start_Time__c), 2)) + VALUE(LEFT(TEXT(Dining_Duration__c), FIND(" ", TEXT(Dining_Duration__c)) - 1)) < 60, TEXT(VALUE(LEFT(TEXT(Dining_Start_Time__c), 2))) & ':' & LPAD(TEXT(VALUE(RIGHT(TEXT(Dining_Start_Time__c), 2)) + VALUE(LEFT(TEXT(Dining_Duration__c), FIND(" ", TEXT(Dining_Duration__c)) - 1))), 2, '0'), TEXT(VALUE(LEFT(TEXT(Dining_Start_Time__c), 2)) + FLOOR((VALUE(RIGHT(TEXT(Dining_Start_Time__c), 2)) + VALUE(LEFT(TEXT(Dining_Duration__c), FIND(" ", TEXT(Dining_Duration__c)) - 1))) / 60)) & ':' & LPAD(TEXT(MOD(VALUE(RIGHT(TEXT(Dining_Start_Time__c), 2)) + VALUE(LEFT(TEXT(Dining_Duration__c), FIND(" ", TEXT(Dining_Duration__c)) - 1)), 60)), 2, '0') )
CustomField.label: Dining End Time
